channel.title: MIROZA RSS Feed
channel.description: Latest stories and deep dives from MIROZA.

item.title: Global Climate Coalition Reaches Emissions Pact
item.description: Leaders from 70 nations locked in binding methane cuts and revived climate finance benchmarks.

item.title: Digital ID Fast-Track Links Emerging Markets
item.description: Finance ministers backed an interoperable ID rail to unlock cheaper remittances and portable health records.

item.title: Northern Corridor Summit Unlocks Infrastructure Funds
item.description: Regional leaders secured $18B for rail modernization and hybrid ports to ease commodity bottlenecks.

item.title: Asia-Pacific Ports Resume Ops After Typhoon Repairs
item.description: Logistics groups restored 80% capacity and prioritized medical cargo lanes after emergency repairs.

item.title: Global Food Security Fund Expands Emergency Stockpiles
item.description: Donor blocs doubled rapid-response grain reserves and tied payouts to drought triggers.
